about_the_game:
A tool to adjust VRM format character models used in games, metaverses, etc.

  • Easily set skirts for models created with VRoid

  • Adjust moving parts in real time while animating

  • Adjust texture and material colors

  • Adjust facial expressions

  • Ability to attach preset parts

  • Compatible with VRM 0.x and 1.x

* VRM model is not included.

Terms of Use

  • Use of the output data from VRM Adjuster is permitted for both commercial and non-commercial purposes.

    • Posting and promoting on social media ... OK

    • Avatar sales ... OK

    • Video Monetization ... OK

    • Goods production ... OK

  • Sexual and violent content is permitted, but please separate it.

  • Use for political, religious or criminal activities is not permitted.

    * Expressions used in fictional settings and stories are fine

  • Use of the site to express slander against a specific person or thing  is not permitted.

  • No credit required

  • About the parts included with the VRM Adjuster

    • Processing of accessory parts ... OK

    • Extract and distribute the included parts ... NG

    • Incorporate included parts into other applications ... NG

    • Original statement of included parts ... NG

  • When loading data into the generation AI,

    you can only use models and parts that you have

    created yourself or that you have explicit permission to use.

    Models and parts that come with VRM Adjuster cannot be used.
    * Exceptions are made for online articles and social media posts

      that are not primarily generated by AI.

  • Please also check the terms and conditions of the distributor

    for the models and materials used.

  • The terms and conditions are subject to change to accommodate different cases.

Credits

Trailer BGM：OtoLogic

The license used in the application is listed in the in-app help.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: This is a tool for adjusting VRM format character models used in games, metaverses, etc. In addition to editing spring bones, colors, expressions, etc., it also has a function to attach preset parts. VRM1.0 compatible!
